name: year
text: Only the years 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 are available (until we get a bigger hard-drive)

name: cf_exponent
full_name: Capacity factor exponent for spatial distribution of wind and solar
text: If exponent is 0 generators are distributed evenly across the region, if it is 1 they are distributed proportional to capacity factor, if it is x they are distributed proportional to (capacity factor)^x

name: frequency
text: n-hourly, n<3 is very slow, big n solves faster (n=25 or n=49 give fast and relatively accurate results)

name: load
text: Demand should be large enough for utility-scale assets but small enough to neglect land availability constraints
